text:
@realDonaldTrump This is what happens when you don't invoke the DPA, Trump. 

America, this is what happens when we have an ignorant narcissistic ass in the WH who doesn't have a clue as to what he is doing.

And it's costing lives!!

#coronavirus #COVIDー19 #COVID19Pandemic #JaredKushner
